com.hexaware.model

Class FinancialRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hexaware.model.FinancialRecord

  • public class FinancialRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a financial record associated with an employee.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pradheesha

      • FinancialRecord

        public FinancialRecord(int recordId,
                       int employeeId,
                       java.time.LocalDate recordDate,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       double amount,
                       java.lang.String recordType)
        Constructs a FinancialRecord object with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        recordId - Unique identifier for the financial record
        employeeId - Identifier of the associated employee
        recordDate - Date of the financial record
        description - Description of the financial transaction
        amount - Amount involved in the financial transaction
        recordType - Type of the financial record (e.g., income, expense)
